For a game from 2008, this game is still fun, no doubt about it.

Love playing single-player / multiplayer with my family and friends. It has its great and funny moments. Achievements are fun to earn / challenging for some of them such as the one where you have to headshot the hunter. Took around 20 minutes to get lol.

The only bad thing I have to say is, and its not really bad, but watch out for trolls online.
If you don't fully know the controls and stuff, they could Vote-change the difficulty to expert, shoot you with a shotgun, kill you, then kill themselves in-game. They are toxic and some of them are campers who don't care if you die from a hunter or smoker or a horde of zombies.

Overall I give it a 9/10

Muito divertido de se jogar.
A campanha se torna um pouco repetitiva depois de um tempo. 
Mas é sempre melhor jogar com amigos que torna o jogo mais divertido e único.
Mesmo depois de todo esse tempo a compra ainda vale.

(this is my first review so please take this with a grain of salt) The controls were easy to master thanks to the hints in the game.  The Gameplay had a fair amount of challenge (well until the finale of the no mercy stage which was too intense for CPU that 2 of them died during said finale in my first playthrough of the game.) What I didn't like was the fact that, one time during my playthrough,  the CPU players were being unresponsive and were standing in one place until I had to force them to teleport inside the safe area but since it was only a glitch it didn't really bother me that much. Overall I'd say that this game is a 7/10 and I would definitely play this again sometime.

It is quite enjoyable for an old game. The graphics is nice and the game does not demand high specification computers. The game looks like a horror game, but it is actually just a first person shooting game with zombies as enemies. I could play it at night without any fear.

Игра топ! Одна из тех игр в которых трейлер соответствует геймплею. Один из самых лучших зомби-экшенов за всю историю игровой индустрии, ragdoll сделан отлично! Графика тоже на уровне, атмосфера закаляющая, толпы зомби лезут изо всех щелей, это очень круто. Идеальная игра для кооператива, проходить и наслаждаться. Онлайн хоть и не большой но всё равно присутствует, комьюнити хорошее, но не отрицаю того что находятся и отброски комьюнити. В общем игра топ. Однозначно рекомендую.

Muy buen juego

It's awesome! Left 4 Dead is a must buy for anyone who loves zombie based FPS games or FPS games in general. The art style and the graphics are beautiful and quite atmospheric. All the campaigns of the game are extremely good and it's a very challenging game if played on higher difficulties. The soundtrack is pretty good too, I like it a lot. it is also a great game to play with your friends, lots of fun is guaranteed. The Story is quite subtle and the game relies mostly on it's gameplay. Left 4 dead is a 10/10 game!

Fantastic game, The game doesn't have much of a story more of an arcade co-op and like all arcade co-op's you should really get friends in here, almost every single mission there was a no life thrower and it made it really tough to beat. However getting all the missions done on expert is really fun and I highly recommend you only do it on expert

Left 4 Dead 1 это отличная и очень хорошая игра про зомби апокалипсис.В ней довольно хороший геймплей а также хорошая разновидность особых заражённых.Также в этой игре довольно хороших и разных режимов игры с помощью которых можно весело повеселится с друзьями.
Great game, recommended, with decent graphics, and fun gameplay.

[h1]This game is a classic.[/h1]

Yes, it has issues, but overall it is really good (I would recommend buying L4D2, though, instead of this, as it comes with this game). 

PROS: 

+ It's Left 4 Dead
+ Fun with friends; the co-op gameplay still holds up in 2020
+ Graphically it is still pretty okay. Valve was always ahead of their time with their graphics (Half Life 2 looks super good for 2004). 

CONS: 

- Multiplayer is a bit dead; everyone plays L4D2 now
- Not a big selection of weapons (L4D2 has more)

Like I said, buy L4D2 instead, not because it is better, but because it comes with this game. I have had fun playing L4D and would recommend it to anyone who enjoys FPS's, co-op games, or zombie shooters. 8.5/10 Valve nailed it.
